nodes.text: The Neo-Middle Secundus was a period of galactic history. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the senior terrain trekker Reginald Danfillo of the League of XenoExplorers discovered a piece of tapestry dating back to the Neo-Middle Secundus during the Typhojem Excavation on Pashvi. During the same outing Danfillo also discovered Quesoth pottery shards and a contemporary book that would become known as the Smuggler's Guide, in which the trekker left a report of the findings from the excavation.
The Neo-Middle Secundus was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
